t: Toilet Tank Lids, Covers, Tops
s: There are no numbers on toilets to indicate a color name. American Standard and Kohler have used some alpha abbreviations on off-whites. This was to aid factory workers in distinguishing similar colors in dim light. BONE = Bone, HTR = Heather, Lin = Linen, SHL = Shell.
